hypothesis: The Girl on the Train had Lisa Kudrow in it.
premise: + The Girl on the Train (2016 film) + The film stars Emily Blunt , Rebecca Ferguson , Haley Bennett , Justin Theroux , Luke Evans , Allison Janney , Édgar Ramírez , and Lisa Kudrow , and follows an alcoholic divorcée who becomes involved in a missing persons investigation . + Lisa Kudrow + Away from television , Kudrow has also appeared in many films , including Romy and Michele 's High School Reunion ( 1997 ) , The Opposite of Sex ( 1998 ) , Analyze This ( 1999 ) and its sequel Analyze That ( 2002 ) , Dr. Dolittle 2 ( 2001 ) , Wonderland ( 2003 ) , Happy Endings ( 2005 ) , P.S. I Love You ( 2007 ) , Bandslam ( 2008 ) , Hotel for Dogs ( 2009 ) , Easy A ( 2010 ) , Neighbors ( 2014 ) , its sequel Neighbors 2 : Sorority Rising ( 2016 ) and The Girl on the Train ( 2016 ) . + Lisa Kudrow + Lisa Valerie Kudrow (  born July 30 , 1963 ) is an American actress , comedian , writer and producer . + The Opposite of Sex + The Opposite of Sex is a 1998 American romantic comedy film written and directed by Don Roos and stars Christina Ricci , Martin Donovan , and Lisa Kudrow . + P.S. I Love You (film) + It stars Hilary Swank , Gerard Butler , Lisa Kudrow , Gina Gershon , James Marsters , Harry Connick Jr. and Jeffrey Dean Morgan .
explanation_1: The Girl on the Train had Lisa Kudrow in it.

hypothesis: The Czech Republic's city that is the largest is Prague.
premise: + Czech Republic + It is a unitary parliamentary republic , has 10.5 million inhabitants and the capital and largest city is Prague , with over 1.2 million residents . + Prague + Prague (  Praha ,  , Prag ) is the capital and largest city of the Czech Republic . + Czech Republic + Besides Bohemia itself , the king of Bohemia ruled the lands of the Bohemian Crown , he had a vote in the election of the Holy Roman Emperor , and Prague was the imperial seat in periods between the 14th and 17th century . + Prague + It is the 14th largest city in the European Union .
explanation_1: The Czech Republic has Prague as its capital and largest city.

hypothesis: Michelle Williams is a film actress.
premise: + Manchester by the Sea (film) + Manchester by the Sea is a 2016 American drama film written and directed by Kenneth Lonergan , and starring Casey Affleck , Michelle Williams , Kyle Chandler , and Lucas Hedges . + Blue Valentine (film) + Blue Valentine is a 2010 American romantic drama film written and directed by Derek Cianfrance . + My Week with Marilyn + My Week with Marilyn is a 2011 British drama film directed by Simon Curtis and written by Adrian Hodges . + Michelle Williams (actress) + She followed this with films such as Martin Scorsese 's Shutter Island ( 2010 ) . + Michelle Williams (actress) + Williams received critical acclaim for the role of Alma , wife of Ennis Del Mar , in Brokeback Mountain ( 2005 ) , for which she won a Broadcast Film Critics Association Award and was nominated for the SAG Award , BAFTA Award , Golden Globe , and Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress .
explanation_1: Michelle Williams is an actress who has appeared in several films.

hypothesis: New York City was a capital for 8 years.
premise: + New York City + New York served as the capital of the United States from 1785 until 1790 .
explanation_1: New York City was the capital of the United States for 8 years.

hypothesis: Jamie Foxx was only in a 2017 film.
premise: + Annie (2014 film) + Annie is a 2014 American musical comedy-drama film directed by Will Gluck and produced by Village Roadshow Pictures and Will Smith 's Overbrook Entertainment for Sony Pictures ' Columbia Pictures . + Collateral (film) + Collateral is a 2004 American neo-noir crime thriller directed by Michael Mann and written by Stuart Beattie . + Django Unchained + Django Unchained is a 2012 American revisionist Western film written and directed by Quentin Tarantino , starring Jamie Foxx , Christoph Waltz , Leonardo DiCaprio , Kerry Washington , and Samuel L. Jackson , with Walton Goggins , Dennis Christopher , James Remar , Michael Parks , and Don Johnson in supporting roles . + Ray (film) + Ray is a 2004 American musical biographical film focusing on 30 years in the life of rhythm and blues musician Ray Charles . + Jamie Foxx + Foxx also starred in the 2014 film Annie , in which he played Will Stacks .
explanation_1: Jamie Foxx was in the 2014 film Annie and the 2004 film Ray.

hypothesis: North Korea's largest city is not its capital.
premise: + North Korea + Pyongyang is the nation 's capital and largest city . + Pyongyang + Pyongyang (  ,  , literally : `` Flat Land '' or `` Peaceful Land '' ) is the capital and largest city of the Democratic People 's Republic of Korea ( commonly known as North Korea ) .
explanation_1: The largest city of North Korea is Pyongyang, not its capital.
